description: (Please complete all items either by inserting the correct information or ticking the relevant item.)

formsections.title: Personal Details
formsections.desciption: Our practice will need to collect your personal information to provide healthcare services to you. Our main purpose for collecting, using, holding and sharing your personal information is to manage your health.

fieldvalidations.validationerrormsg: Family name is required to complete this form
Family name is should be at least 5 chars complete this form
Family name is should be at max 10 chars complete this form
BP systolic shoud be between 100 to 300
BP systolic should be at least 100
BP diastolic shoud be between 40 to 160
BP diastolic should be at least 40
This email Id doesnt seem right!

formsections.title: Previous Address & Doctor Details
formsections.desciption: Please help us trace your previous medical records by providing the following information.

sectionfields.fieldlabeltext: Your previous address in the UK

fieldvalidations.validationerrormsg: Your previous address in UK, mate! we need it.
Your previous address in UK should be at least 5 chars.
Your previous address in UK can be a max of 20 chars!

sectionfields.fieldlabeltext: Name of previous doctor while at that address

formsections.title: If you are from abroad
formsections.desciption: For information about how to access healthcare, including planned treatment, in Wales, Northern Ireland or Scotland, visit the relevant territory's website.

sectionfields.fieldlabeltext: Your first UK address where registered with a GP
If previously resident in the UK, date of leaving
Date you first came to live in the UK

formsections.title: If you are returning from the Armed Forces
formsections.desciption: If you are returning from the Armed Forces, we require a copy of your 'F Med133 Discharge Form' in order to process your registration. You cannot be registered permanently without this.

sectionfields.fieldlabeltext: Are you dependent on someone for some or all of the time?
Do you look after someone who is dependent on you for some or all of the time?
How much on a daily basis do you / did you smoke?
How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
How many units of alcohol do you have per week on average?
How many units of alcohol do you drink on a typical day when you are drinking?
How often have you had 6 or more units if female, or 8 or more units if male, on a single occasion in the last year?
Do you have any of the following condition?
Do any of your family members have a history of, or problems with:
If yes to any of the above, which family member(s)
If yes to IHD, was / is the family member
If you have allergies, please provide details, i.e. reaction
Do you have any communication or information needs that we should be aware of?
If you answered 'Yes', please give details below.
Do you give consent for this information to be shared with other healthcare organisations as and when required?
By signing below, you are declaring that the information contained within this patient registration form is accurate to the best of your knowledge.
Any suspected fraudulent information will be reported to the relevant authorities.
